means: （尤指作为一种职业的）教育工作者，教员，教师

sentence.Network_en: The television producer today has to be part news person, part educator.
sentence.Network_cn: 今天的电视制片人必须既是新闻人，又是教育者。

sentence.Network_en: He was a well - known educator.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是一个有名的教育家.

sentence.Network_en: The educator located the local location allocated to him.
sentence.Network_cn: 教育家定出了分配给他的局部的位置。

entry.def: An educator is a person who educates people.
An educator is someone who is specialized in the theories and methods of education.

auth_sentence.content: The educator said, Look... children are beautiful.
auth_sentence.res_content: The educator said, Look... children are beautiful.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The educator said, Look... children are beautiful.

auth_sentence.content: He was not an educator in a narrow pedagogic sense.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was not an educator in a narrow pedagogic sense.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was not an educator in a narrow pedagogic sense.

auth_sentence.content: Noted educator, author and optometrist Dr. Paul Karpecki agrees.
auth_sentence.res_content: Noted educator, author and optometrist Dr. Paul Karpecki agrees.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,主要表示"人或物器"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 前辈,前任,[被取代的]原有事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: pre前+de+cess走+or人→前面走过的人→前辈
act行动,行为,扮演+or人或物器→n.男演员,行动者,参与者
aggress侵略,进攻+or人或物器→n.侵略者,攻击者
arbitrate仲裁,公断+or人或物器→n.仲裁人,公断者
auth+or人或物器→n.作家,创造者
collect收集+or人或物器→n.收藏家,征收者
compress挤压+or人或物器→n.压缩机
conquer征服,战胜+or人或物器→n.征服者,胜利者
create创作+or人或物器→n.创造者,创作者
credit贷款+or人或物器→n.债权人
designate指定+or人或物器→n.指示者,指定者

stems_affixes.value_cn: 发现者,侦察器,探测器,检波器,检电器
stems_affixes.word_buile: detect察觉,发觉+or人或物器→n.发现者,侦察器,探测器,检波器,检电器
educate教育+or人或物器→educator教育家
execute执行+or人或物器→n.遗嘱执行人,执行者
gladiate剑状的+or人或物器→n.角斗士,与野兽搏斗者
indicate指示+or人或物器→n.指示器,[化]指示剂
ment精神+or人或物器→n.导师
moderate中等的+or人或物器→n.调解人,仲裁人
oppress压迫,压制+or人或物器→n.压迫者
past+or人或物器→原来是拉丁文"牧羊人"的意思
process过程,处理+or人或物器→n.处理机,处理器
proct监督+or人或物器→n.代理人,学监
project投射出+or人或物器→n.放映机

stems_affixes.value_cn: 海员,水手,不大会晕船的人,船员
stems_affixes.word_buile: sail航行+or人或物器→n.海员,水手,不大会晕船的人,船员

stems_affixes.value_cn: 继承者,接任者,后续的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: success成功,胜利+or人或物器→继续着别人的成功→继承者,接任者
vend出售+or人或物器→n.小贩

Sentence.sentence: Quite often, educators tell families of children who are learning English as a second language to speak only English, and not their native language, at home.
Although these educators may have good intentions,their advice to families is misguided, and it stemsfrom misunderstandings about the process of language acquisition
Educators may fear that children hearing two languages will become permanently confused and thus their language development will be delayed ;this concern is not documented in the literature.

means.word_mean: (尤指作为一种职业的)教育工作者,教员,教师

sentences.en: Educators try to put pupils of similar abilities into classes because they believe that this homogeneous grouping is advisable.
sentences.cn: 教育学家设法将学生按相近的能力分班,因为他们认为这种按同等水平划分班级的做法是明智的。
他是一个有名的教育家。
